result.execSummary:
The defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Maintain Drug Trafficking Place, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.42(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Sentence w/held probation 3 years - costs - any counseling DOC may recommend - AODA and any follow thru and maintain absolute sobriety

miscConds.notes: $268.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent
AODA assessment  within 45 days and follow-through with recommendations

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Bachman makes stmt.  DE is requesting a new attorney.  Court makes stmt and addressed the defendant.  DE is sure she wants a new attorney.  
Court will release Mr. Bachman.  Status conference scheduled for January 17, 2017 at 10:00 am.

OFF THE RECORD:   Defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for December 6, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Bachman acknowledged reciept of information entered plea of NG.  Court entered NG plea.  Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Bruce Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Bachman waived prelim.  Court addressed the defendant as to her waiver of prelim.  DE does not wish to have prelim.  Court finds defendant has freely waived her right to prelim - finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  Arraignment scheduled for August 9, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty in court with attorney John Charles Bachman via phone.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 09:45 am.

Defendant JoAnn Marie Dougherty in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.   SIBS $1000.   DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.    Scheduling conference scheduled for May 24, 2016 at 10:00 am.
